en-US.title: Settings
en-US.midiDescription: You can record incoming MIDI notes straight into the patterns by clicking the record button in the transport controls. You can also record quantized notes live during playback
en-US.noMidiDevices: There are no available MIDI devices. Attach a new/different device and try again.
en-US.midiFailure: MIDI Unavailable, Efflux could not connect to MIDI device(s)
en-US.midiEnabled: Listening to MIDI messages coming from {device}
